entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Hart Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 late this evening. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 9.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then to 70 gusting to 100 early in the afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending late in the evening then partly cloudy. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 70 km/h gusting to 100 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
